name: Website Portfolio
description: A portfolio website based on the VSCode theme.

name: Honeypot
description: deploy a cybersecurity honeypot, a decoy system designed to lure and deceive attackers, in order to gather intelligence on their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs).

name: DNA Toolkit
description: Python script given an input sequences of amino acids, transcribes them into RNA sequences, and then translates them into corresponding protein sequences. It utilizes simple data structures for efficient sequence manipulation and translation.
